import {useState} from 'react' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import Tasks from './Tasks' import Reminders from './Reminders' import Goals from './Goals' const Menu = () => { const [className, setClassName] = useState(" ") function changeTab() { path="/" ? setClassName('active') : setClassName('') } return (
Tasks Reminders Goals
) } export default Menu
